Click the "bilibili" application icon to open the application.
Click on the 'Animation' tab to switch the interface to the animation content section.
Click on the episode card "#1 全13话 迷途之子!!!!! 邦邦跨媒体企划新章" to view details.
Click the first episode, "第1话 - 羽丘的不可思议女孩".
Click "第2话,不会再邀请你了", which is currently unavailable for free viewing.
Click the "PV" option under the "PV&角色介绍" section to view related videos.
Navigate back to the previous screen, returning to the main content feed.
Click the red-boxed video titled "我独自升级 第二季 - 起于暗影 -" to start playing it.
